Job Description: Software Developer Hiring creative,  passionate,  innovative programmers who can build and maintain good quality product by thinking out of the box. If you have a passion for technology and creating things which can attract users,  you fit in! As a software developer in our engineering team you should be a creative thinker and possess deep passion for coding and coffee.Experience Required: 2- 4 Years. Desired Skillset Very Strong knowledge of PHP and MySQL. Strong knowledge of working with OOPS. Strong skills in jQuery and AJAX. Creative logical and analytical skills. Working knowledge of android and iOS would be a plus. Good knowledge of HTML and CSS. Creative Thinker. Good verbal and presentation skills is a must.
